stimulusHtml: At time t = 0 , a ball is thrown with initial speed v0 at an angle θ above the horizontal. Air resistance is negligible. Which of the following best represents the speed of the ball as a function of time t while the ball is in flight?
choicesHtml: v 0 2 cos 2 θ+ ( v 0 sinθ−gt ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4BDF@

( v 0 cosθ−gt ) 2 + v 0 2 sin 2 θ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4BF4@

( v 0 cosθ−gt ) 2 + ( v 0 sinθ−gt ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4F9C@
